markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unimpeded Step](/Feats.aspx?ID=216) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 109 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[liberator cause](/Causes.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

With a burst of divine liberation, your ally’s movement from your [Liberating Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=7) is unaffected by difficult terrain, greater difficult terrain, narrow surfaces, and uneven ground.
name: Unimpeded Step
